    • getPlayerName

      public String getPlayerName(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Get the player name from its handler.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the player client handler.
      Returns:
      the name of the player associated with the handler.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInLobbyException - if the player requested is not in this lobby.

      Returns:

    • cleanUpAfterGame

      public boolean cleanUpAfterGame()
      Clean up all game info after completing a game.
      Returns:
      true if the creator player of the lobby is still in the lobby, false otherwise.
